ygData.subject: Re: Again, here I am...
ygData.msgSnippet: [quote]But I ve been told that about 40% of Drinal is 50+ or has a character 50+. From what I can tell from the consensus of people-- that s probably close to
ygData.messageBody:
[quote]But I've been told that about 40% of
Drinal is 50+ or has a character 50+. From what I can
tell from the consensus of people-- that's probably
close to truth.[/quote]<br><br>Wow, really? That's
pretty wild. But now that you mention it, yeah, there
does seem to be a surplus of high-level characters
sometimes. I was counting the number of Rogues once, and
noticed that there were more Rogues in there 50s than
1-49 combined, or close to it, anyway. <br><br>Where
did you hear this, anyway? I love weird statistical
stuff like this.<br><br>Come to Sullon Zek -- a
high-level Paladin just gave my cleric a nice item. But
that's the first thing; at a similar level on Drinal, I
had stuff oozing out of my ears, people just keep
giving it to me. <br><br>Kharlisht
